inputs.research_question: What is Physical AI, and how do physical robotics and simulation environments work together to enable embodied intelligence?
inputs.scope: Opening chapter - Definition, scope, physical robotics, simulation AI, and integrated understanding

dual_domain_coverage.notes: Comprehensive coverage of both physical hardware/embodiment and simulation/AI aspects with explicit integration examples

excluded_sources.notes: All sources are Tier 1 (academic papers, official documentation) or Tier 2 (verified industry sources). Zero Wikipedia or unreliable sources used.
